tweets.body: Blockchain #technology is being considered in various industries due to its track and trace capabilities. At #LOX, we’re bringing #blockchain and #Microdot technology to the wireless device #security industry.

The #electric #fireplace is a kind of #transformation of the fire. The principle of the electric fireplace is to quote the European classical fireplace production #technology and modern acoustooptics, so that the design of the traditional fireplace has been greatly changed

When sensors, IoT and holograms merge to make holographic avatars dance... A stunning show!Learn more about these new technologies and many more by joining FuturePass, our new Web3 Community: http://futurepass.xyz
